snippet: President Obama on Tuesday moved to preserve more than 1,600 acres of coastal land in Northern California by declaring them part of a national monument.
abstract: Pres Obama moves to preserve more than 1,600 acres of coastal land in Northern California by declaring them part of California Coastal National Monument.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Tuesday moved to preserve more than 1,600 acres of coastal land in Northern California by declaring them part of a national monument.

headline.main: Obama Adds to National Monument Land
headline.print_headline: Obama Adds to National Monument Land
